mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (id, pw, nickname, productName, price, description, location, image_url, prod_condition) VALUES (#{seller_id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{location}, #{image_url}, #{prod_condition})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET productName=#{productName}, price=#{price}, location=#{location}, description=#{description}, image_url=#{image_url}, prod_condition=#{prod_condition} WHERE seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Board ORDER BY seq DESC
